OpenAI API Platform, on the other hand, is OpenAI API Platform provides developers with programmatic access to all of OpenAI's models including GPT-5.2, GPT-4o, o3, DALL-E 3, Whisper, and embeddings. Ideal for building AI-powered applications, integrations, and custom solutions at scale.. Users choose it for api, developer-platform, openai.

sections.title: Use Cases: When to Choose Each Tool
